review: I have Chromecast on another TV and thought I'd try the Fire Stick. It was OK at first but now as you watch it the videos will freeze, the audio continues and then the video fast forwards to catch up. This happens about 5 times per 30 minute show. It's very annoying. I wish I had purchased another Chromecast.
author: Pat Brown

review: I have had trouble with both of my fire sticks. At times it gives a message across the screen saying console disabled, you can hear the movie/show but you can't view it. And for the first time ever Amazon did not make it easy to get a replacement. It's very disappointing.
author: V. Debree

review: Gets really hot! I like all the features and stuff but worried its going to break really fast.  I've had it for 30 hours now. I slept for 4 hours with it in sleep mode and touched it and it was really warm. So i unplug it to cool.  The next day i ran screen mirroring, after 40 minutes its out of microwave hot. My phone gets warm when mirroring,  but the streaming stick it up to 6 times hotter than the phone
